PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (NATURAL RESOURCES) to the extent of giving effect to measures in the 1996, 1997 and 1999 Federal Budgets respecting resource-related expenditures (a new category called "Canadian Renewable and Conservation Expenses") and capital cost (depreciation) allowances related thereto.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0327 Publication Date: 2000-09-13
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (NATURAL RESOURCES) to the
extent of giving effect to measures in the 1996, 1997 and 1999 Federal
Budgets respecting resource-related expenditures (a new category called
"Canadian Renewable and Conservation Expenses") and capital cost
(depreciation) allowances related thereto.
